milestone_description: PEC 45/2019 introduced by Deputy Baleia Rossi
CBS/IBS pilot begins; businesses adapt systems
Pilot evaluation; final adjustments before full rollout
PIS/COFINS fully replaced by CBS; ICMS/ISS begin reduction
ICMS/ISS reduced 10 pp annually; IBS rate increases
ICMS/ISS reduced 10 pp; Regional Fund compensation begins
ICMS/ISS fully eliminated; CBS/IBS only taxes; 50-year transition starts
Full destination-based taxation achieved; reform complete
